channel.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O
channel.description:
These are some old sketches I've done over the past 3-4 years, most of them are stills out of boredom, some are shit, some are decent, whatever.
90% of them are done within 5-10 minutes (hence the unfinishedness) to learn myself some drawing discipline.
Leaf: [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/002.jpg[/img]
Collection of leafs: [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/005.jpg[/img]
Some dude from my class (3 years ago): [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/014.jpg[/img]
Girl laying down: [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/016.jpg[/img] [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/017.jpg[/img]
Girl sitting: [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/018.jpg[/img]
Girl standing (lol chair-perspective): [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/019.jpg[/img]
Putting a pose on paper within 30 seconds: [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/022.jpg[/img]
Girl from class 3 years ago (no, she didn't fall on the floor with the back of her head, I just sucked at getting the curve right): [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Schetsboek/024.jpg[/img]
Now for some random doodles and cartoony-stuff: [img]https://img686.imageshack.us/img686/8476/53331239017735622123462.jpg[/img]
(Yes, I used to play WoW): [img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Portfolio/Images/Illustratie/Troll.jpg[/img]
[img]https://users.telenet.be/bolteh/Portfolio/Images/Illustratie/Jetpack.jpg[/img]
So there, besides trolling and trying to start a discussion with others, eventhough I don't give a shit, I also draw.

item.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Pencils on paper, scanned, inking in Illustrator, coloring in Photoshop. Original image was something around 20001400 or so, but due to my external HD falling out of a window once (don’t ask), I lost that one, so only have a 1000something back-up PSD left (though I still have the Illustrator files).

Process looks something like this:

(forgive me for a horrible sketch with loads of perspective issues, it was done while sitting on a bus :< )

Edit: found some older stuff in the depths of my webspace.

One of those ideas that never got past the doodling stage:

This one too, but I never fixed and finished it because I liked it less and less over time:

Another one, though this one made it as far as Illustrator:

Don Carlos! (!!!)

Concept I once did for a 3D-modeling competition, but never got anywhere (because I suck at 3D ).


4 years ago, inspired by Guild Wars:

Read full topic

item.description:

Did you make them with photoshop or Illustrator?

item.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Yarr, huge fan of Jhonen Vasquez’ style, my cartoony-style was greatly influenced by him. Even my current style (the spacey-floating-german-type-of-guy) shows a lot of influenced bits and pieces.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O

item.description:
The zombie+ the hobo remind me of the style from Invader Zim. You are really good at sketching, keep it up!

item.description:
Nice Sketches…keep up the good work!

Read full topic

item.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Well OK, that I do a lot (bad habit of mine is to check into things for graphical errors (and recently even errors in stories/plots).

But with studying, I thought you meant having an actual teacher showing me the tricks of the trade, or reading books on anatomy and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O
item.dc:creator: Patonki
item.description:
yeah you’re lying when you say you don’t study. you may not think of it as studying, but youre still doing it. stuying like drawing for references and looking at objects to see how they react to light, are shaped, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
I didn’t really study/learn drawing. I just draw.

Of course, since I followed Graphical Design in both high school and college, I had some drawing classes, but they were just “here’s stuff you can draw, now draw it”, so no real studying/learning, apart from doing it a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
Ibanez:

Those are really good. I’m impressed with your ability to sketch the human form so easily and quickly- organic forms are the hardest.

It’s the direct opposite for me, I can’t draw buildings or objects.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Sketch-Dump :O
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
I find it as hard as drawing still objects. It just boils down to looking and studying what you draw. My main tools are my eyes.

Read full topic
